languages.text: {n}Ксенос щелкает металлом в некоем подобии смеха.{/n} "Древнее оружие, что было сломлено в забытых битвах... ничтожество!"
{n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос щелкает металлом в некоем подобии смеха.{/n} "Древнее оружие, что было сломлено в забытых битвах... ничтожество!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

{n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

languages.text: {n}El xenos suelta un chasquido metálico que imita una risa.{/n} «Un arma antigua que se rompió en batallas olvidadas... ¡inútil!».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos suelta un chasquido metálico que imita una risa.{/n} «Un arma antigua que se rompió en batallas olvidadas... ¡inútil!».

languages.text: {n}Le xénos laisse échapper un cliquetis métallique qui ressemble à un rire.{/n} « Une arme ancienne qui a été brisée lors de batailles oubliées... Pathétique ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos laisse échapper un cliquetis métallique qui ressemble à un rire.{/n} « Une arme ancienne qui a été brisée lors de batailles oubliées... Pathétique ! »

languages.text: {n}異種族は笑い声にも似た金属音をカチカチと鳴らす。{/n}「忘れられし戦いで破壊された、古の武器…無意味なものだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は笑い声にも似た金属音をカチカチと鳴らす。{/n}「忘れられし戦いで破壊された、古の武器…無意味なものだ！」

languages.text: {n}这只异形发出了金属的咔哒声，仿佛在笑。{/n}“在那场被遗忘的战斗，遭到毁坏的远古武器……没有任何价值！”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这只异形发出了金属的咔哒声，仿佛在笑。{/n}“在那场被遗忘的战斗，遭到毁坏的远古武器……没有任何价值！”

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos stößt ein metallisches Klicken aus, eine Art Lachen.{/n} "Eine uralte Waffe, die in vergessenen Schlachten zerbrochen ist ... wertlos!"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos stößt ein metallisches Klicken aus, eine Art Lachen.{/n} "Eine uralte Waffe, die in vergessenen Schlachten zerbrochen ist ... wertlos!"

languages.text: {n}Zenodan gülüşe benzeyen, metalik tıkırtılar yükseliyor.{/n} "Unutulmuş muharebelerde bozulan kadim bir silah... İşe yaramaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos lets out a metallic click, a semblance of laughter.{/n} "An ancient weapon that was broken in battles forgotten... worthless!"
